sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <campaigns/> <description>(Maneuver) When piloting a vehicle of silhouette 5 or smaller, the character may take the Intuitive Evasion maneuver, suffering 1 strain and committing a number of force dice (white d12) no greater than his Force rating or his ranks of Intuitive Evasion. He then upgrades the difficulty of combat checks targeting his vehicle by an equal amount. The character suffers 1 strain at the beginning of each of his turns in which these dice remain committed.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>true</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Intuitive evasion</name> <number>TAL0001064</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-01-21 23:34:47</sys_created_on> <sys_id>b325e768db2e0c542901de90cf961996</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-01-21 23:34:47</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
